channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Someone dumped a machine and some construction boots on the canal walk, 25th October
item.description:
Someone dumped a machine and some construction boots on the canal walk. It was too heavy to pick it up on our litter pick. Please come and clear it.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Branch Place, Hackney, London

item.title: Over hanging large tree, 25th October
item.description:
Tree overhanging public highway, people now having to duck to avoid branches. Also overhanging pathway to properties 116 -120 Plaistow Lane which is a hazard for residents, they are wary of cutting overhanging branches as the tree is on public land. This is a lovely tree but increasingly is becoming a hazard

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Plaistow Lane, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipped cushions, 25th October
item.description:

item.title: Dead pigeon found under front door gate, 25th October
item.description:
We just found this dead pigeon on our front doorstep this morning, in appleshaw house. No idea how it got there, might have flown into our gate? But it needs to be removed

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Estate Road, East Dulwich, London

item.title: Abandoned Mercedes, 25th October
item.description:
